display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Havens on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Barrier. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)
display_target_help: The Sonic Haven has increased your resistances to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks with a {PowerName}.
